name: Out of Control (Katrina Grace)
description:
A small puzzle game about a lonely cat trying to reach the outside world.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. Pressing R will restart the current room.

Each room has a limited number of moves, displayed by the letters in key words of the cat's narration draining to gray.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020. The theme of the jam was "out of control", leading to the original concept of quite literally running out of the word "control" itself.

Any images of real cats are royalty-free and pulled from Google Images. Here's a picture of my actual cat, Natalie, to help clear up any confusion (and because she's cute):
